Name: Jade Garden
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
Review: Not too dry, nor too sweet, but tasty, balanced and refreshing.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2004 by Michael Butt and Giles Looker of Soulshakers, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Jade Garden contains 227 calories
